plugins.name: Design Critter üêõ ‚Äì Feedback Makes You Better
plugins.description:
AI Feedback on your designs for websites, web apps, mobile apps, emails and more.


How it works:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Select a frame, group or layer you want feedback on
  3. Open the plugin
  4. Select the area of design you want feedback on
  5. Recommended: Add any supporting context on what you're designing, what the user goals are, or specific element you want feedback on
  6. Click Get Feedback
  7. Copy any of the feedback and paste it next in your file so you don't lose it


Most importantly if you have any feedback for us, please email kovacjeremy@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Instant AI feedback on your designs helping you improve UX, UI, content and more.

Elevate your design standards with our Color Contrast Checker‚Äîa vital tool for creating visually accessible and user-friendly digital content.

plugins.name: HCT Variablinator
plugins.description:
HCT Variablinator generates a color palette following Google's HCT color theory. It can then create a Figma Variables collection with all the tones created. You can then reference these through Aliases in your other collections.


It can also generate swatches directly into your Figma documents based on your Figma Variables collection with contrast/WCAG information.


Future features:

  1. Code gen for theming using style-dictionary for plug and play
  2. Gitlab/Github integration support
plugins.tagline: Variablinate your HCT scales for brands and themes

138924.name: HCT Variablinator

    b. Able to select the scale for each individual color
3. Added UI updates for displaying contrast values for the different steps in each color.
4. Added the ability to create swatches for your Figma Variables in your Figma document

Coming soon:

plugins.name: Stellar - Streamline Your Design Handoff
plugins.description:
Stellar üöÄ empowers you to create organized and professional documentation for your design handoff. With four robust tools, you can structure your Figma files in a clean and intuitive manner.


Frame Identifier - Ideal for pinpointing specific screens or components.

Easily create clear headers to identify individual frames:

  1. Select any frame or group of elements.
  2. Add a title and subtitle.
  3. A polished header will be generated above your selection, enhancing clarity and organization.


Section Identifier - Perfect for grouping features or user flows.

Organize related frames with cohesive section headers:

  1. Select multiple frames that belong together.
  2. Add a section title and description.
  3. A header will be created that spans across all selected frames, providing a unified view.


Flow Identifier - Essential for tracking progress and communicating state.

Document your navigation flows with intuitive status indicators:

  1. Select frames within your user flow.
  2. Add a title and description.
  3. Choose a status (e.g., In Progress, Ready for Development).
  4. Status tags are color-coded and include helpful icons, making it easy to convey the current state.



Connector Arrows - Connect your frames with intelligent arrows.

Seamlessly link frames with dynamic arrows:

  1. Select two or more frames to connect.
  2. Choose from 4 arrow styles: Default Arrow (clean and simple), Success Arrow (positive flows), Error Arrow (error states), Dashed Arrow (alternative paths).
  3. Toggle between light and dark modes for optimal visibility.
  4. Arrows automatically adjust to frame positions, ensuring a tidy and logical layout.


Perfect for:

  1. Design Systems
  2. User Flow Documentation
  3. Development Handoff
  4. Project Status Tracking
  5. Team Collaboration



Start organizing your Figma files with Stellar and create documentation that both designers and developers will appreciate! üöÄüöÄüöÄ
plugins.tagline: Streamline your design handoff with organized headers, sections, and smart connectors

plugins.name: Figma To Rust
plugins.description:
Figma To Rust Plugin Export

Streamline your design-to-development workflow with the Figma To Rust Plugin Export. This powerful plugin bridges the gap between your creative designs in Figma and the robust interface code needed for Rust plugins.


Features:

  1. Seamless Export: Easily export your Figma sketches directly into interface code tailored for Rust plugins.
  2. Time-Saving: Reduce the manual effort required to translate designs into code, allowing you to focus more on creativity and functionality.
  3. Consistent Design: Ensure that your Rust plugin interfaces maintain the same visual fidelity as your original Figma designs.
  4. Easy Integration: Integrate the exported code effortlessly into your existing Rust projects, making it a breeze to update and iterate on your designs.


How It Works:

  1. Design in Figma: Create your interface designs using Figma's intuitive tools.
  2. Export with Plugin: Use the Figma To Rust Plugin Export to convert your designs into Rust-compatible interface code.
  3. Implement in Rust: Import the generated code into your Rust project and start building your plugin with a solid visual foundation.


Ideal For:

  1. Developers looking to accelerate the development process for Rust plugins.
  2. Designers who want to ensure their designs are accurately represented in the final product.
  3. Teams seeking to improve collaboration between design and development phases.


Experience the efficiency and accuracy of the Figma To Rust Plugin Export today and elevate your plugin development process to new heights!
plugins.tagline: Allows you to export your sketches from Figma to interface code for Rust plugins

plugins.name: Apply modes to all pages
plugins.description:
This plugin works by replicating the current page selected variable modes to every other page of the document.


Instructions

  1. Set the desired modes in the current page.
  2. While in the page, run the plugin.
  3. Check the other pages to see if the modes were applied correctly.


Useful information:

  1. The plugin will replace modes within the same collection.
  2. The plugin will not remove modes. If a page has an additional collection that is not in the current page, it will keep it.
  3. For large files, it might take a little while for the plugin to finish running, wait for a message saying ‚Äù‚ú® All done! ‚ú®‚Äù. It might also take a while for the file to finish uploading.
plugins.tagline: Replicate Current Page Mode in all pages of the document

plugins.name: AdaptaFont‚ÄîIntelligent Font Scaling for Seamless Multi-Format Scenarios
plugins.description:
1. Text Font Size Adaptation for Different Image Dimension Requirements

Automatically adjusts text font size by modifying the fixed width and line count parameters according to different image dimension needs (e.g., designs for multiple e-commerce platforms), enabling rapid completion of typesetting in such scenarios.


2. Text Font Size Adaptation for Different Language Requirements

Through configuring font family, font weight, and line height settings, the plugin automatically adjusts font sizes for text content in various languages to adapt to the preset text width and line count, thereby quickly fulfilling typesetting requirements for globalized designs.


Features:


‚å®Ô∏è Methods to Obtain Text:

Designers can acquire text content requiring adaptive font sizes either by selecting text nodes or inputting/pasting new text in the plugin's input field.


üîÑ Reacquire Text Content & Text Properties:

Designers can click the refresh button to reacquire the text content, font, font weight, and line height of selected text layers on the canvas for further adjustments and optimization.


üëÄ Predict Actual Line Count:

The plugin features actual line count prediction capability, forecasting real line numbers based on current text content and settings to help designers better plan text layout.


‚ÜôÔ∏è Window Scaling:

The plugin window can be minimized by collapsing setting items, proving highly efficient in scenarios requiring rapid multi-language text replacement using identical text properties.

Instant Chinese/English interface language switching

plugins.name: Smart Rename
plugins.description:
Smart Rename is a powerful Figma plugin built to streamline your workflow by letting you bulk rename frames customizable base names and smart suffixes like version numbers, dimensions, or sequence numbers.


It also fixes a common frustration in UI design: decimal positioning. When frames have non-integer X or Y values, exported assets often end up with unwanted white lines or blurry edges. Smart Rename solves this by auto-aligning frames to the nearest whole pixel, ensuring clean, sharp exports every time.


From organization to export-readiness, this plugin saves time and eliminates manual, error-prone tasks‚Äîall in a few clicks.
plugins.tagline: Bulk rename and align Figma frames in seconds. Add version, size, or number suffixes effortlessly.

plugins.name: Time2Frame
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you analyze, adjust, and visualize animation settings in real-time‚Äîenhancing precision and efficiency in motion design.


How It Works:


1. Animation Data Extraction

Instantly retrieve animation properties from selected frames, including:

  1. Animation Type: Move In, Fade, Smart Animate, and more.
  2. Direction: Left, Right, Top, Bottom.
  3. Easing Curve: Ease In, Ease Out, Linear, Custom Spring.
  4. Timing Details: Delay and duration (in milliseconds).

Effortlessly gain insights into how animations behave within your prototypes.


2. Frame Rate Conversion

Easily convert animation timing into frame counts based on industry-standard frame rates:

  1. 24 FPS
  2. 30 FPS
  3. 60 FPS

The plugin automatically recalculates delays and durations into frames, ensuring precise control over motion timing.


3. Real-Time Input Adjustments

Modify Delay and Duration values directly in the plugin and see instant updates in:

  1. Milliseconds (for precise timing).
  2. Frames (for seamless animation alignment across FPS settings).

No need for manual calculations‚ÄîTime2Frame does it all for you.


4. Animation Preview

Visualize how your animation moves, scales, and fades with an interactive preview. The preview dynamically adjusts to reflect extracted animation properties, allowing designers to fine-tune their animations with confidence.


5. Custom Spring Curve Calculation & Visualization

If a Custom Spring easing is detected, Time2Frame breaks it down into:

  1. Stiffness
  2. Damping
  3. Mass

The plugin generates a real-time graph that illustrates the spring curve, making it easy to refine complex motion dynamics.


Key Features:


  1. Animation Data Extraction ‚Äì Retrieve animation type, easing, and timing in seconds.
  2. Frame Rate Conversion ‚Äì Automatically convert timing into frames for 24, 30, or 60 FPS.
  3. Instant Adjustments ‚Äì Modify animation values with real-time updates.
  4. Live Animation Preview ‚Äì See how animations behave with accurate visual feedback.
  5. Custom Spring Analysis ‚Äì Break down spring physics and visualize easing curves.
  6. Smart UI Integration ‚Äì Works seamlessly with Figma‚Äôs native environment.


Who Is It For?


Time2Frame is built for motion designers, UX/UI designers, and developers who need precise animation breakdowns and real-time adjustments in Figma. Whether you‚Äôre fine-tuning micro-interactions or optimizing complex motion flows, this plugin streamlines your workflow and improves animation predictability across different frame rates.
plugins.tagline: Designed for motion designers‚Äîselect a frame, instantly analyze its animation settings in real time.

123466.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you analyze, adjust, and visualize animation settings in real-time‚Äîenhancing precision and efficiency in motion design.


How It Works:


1. Animation Data Extraction

Instantly retrieve animation properties from selected frames, including:

  1. Animation Type: Move In, Fade, Smart Animate, and more.
  2. Direction: Left, Right, Top, Bottom.
  3. Easing Curve: Ease In, Ease Out, Linear, Custom Spring.
  4. Timing Details: Delay and duration (in milliseconds).

Effortlessly gain insights into how animations behave within your prototypes.


2. Frame Rate Conversion

Easily convert animation timing into frame counts based on industry-standard frame rates:

  1. 24 FPS
  2. 30 FPS
  3. 60 FPS

The plugin automatically recalculates delays and durations into frames, ensuring precise control over motion timing.


3. Real-Time Input Adjustments

Modify Delay and Duration values directly in the plugin and see instant updates in:

  1. Milliseconds (for precise timing).
  2. Frames (for seamless animation alignment across FPS settings).

No need for manual calculations‚ÄîTime2Frame does it all for you.


4. Animation Preview

Visualize how your animation moves, scales, and fades with an interactive preview. The preview dynamically adjusts to reflect extracted animation properties, allowing designers to fine-tune their animations with confidence.


5. Custom Spring Curve Calculation & Visualization

If a Custom Spring easing is detected, Time2Frame breaks it down into:

  1. Stiffness
  2. Damping
  3. Mass

The plugin generates a real-time graph that illustrates the spring curve, making it easy to refine complex motion dynamics.


Key Features:


  1. Animation Data Extraction ‚Äì Retrieve animation type, easing, and timing in seconds.
  2. Frame Rate Conversion ‚Äì Automatically convert timing into frames for 24, 30, or 60 FPS.
  3. Instant Adjustments ‚Äì Modify animation values with real-time updates.
  4. Live Animation Preview ‚Äì See how animations behave with accurate visual feedback.
  5. Custom Spring Analysis ‚Äì Break down spring physics and visualize easing curves.
  6. Smart UI Integration ‚Äì Works seamlessly with Figma‚Äôs native environment.


Who Is It For?


Time2Frame is built for motion designers, UX/UI designers, and developers who need precise animation breakdowns and real-time adjustments in Figma. Whether you‚Äôre fine-tuning micro-interactions or optimizing complex motion flows, this plugin streamlines your workflow and improves animation predictability across different frame rates.
123466.release_notes: Added 120fps and Custom. Fixed bug with dissolve animation. Fixed status of selections.
123466.tagline: Designed for motion designers‚Äîselect a frame, instantly analyze its animation settings in real time.

plugins.name: Figma to Storyteq
plugins.description:
Turn your Figma designs into Storyteq dynamic editable ads.


The Figma to Storyteq Plugin enables designers to effortlessly export their Figma designs into Storyteq, turning static visuals into dynamic and customizable ad templates.


Streamline your workflow and scale content production with ease.


  1. Efficient Export ‚Äì Quickly send your Figma designs to Storyteq in just a few clicks.
  2. Dynamic Template Creation ‚Äì Convert static designs into adaptable templates ready for automation with Storyteq‚Äôs Ad Engine.
  3. User-Friendly Interface ‚Äì Intuitive, seamless integration between Figma and Storyteq.


How It Works


  1. Design in Figma ‚Äì Create your visuals as usual.
  2. Export via Plugin ‚Äì Use the Figma to Storyteq Plugin to send Figma designs to Storyteq.
  3. Customize in Storyteq ‚Äì Modify and manage your dynamic templates for automated content creation.


Use Cases


  1. Marketing Campaigns ‚Äì Develop adaptable templates for various assets.
  2. Brand Consistency ‚Äì Ensure design uniformity across platforms.
  3. Rapid Prototyping ‚Äì Quickly generate dynamic versions of design concepts.



Getting Started


To begin transforming your static designs into dynamic ad templates, download the Figma to Storyteq Plugin today. This tool is exclusively available for users with an active Storyteq license. Follow these simple steps to integrate your designs with Storyteq:


  1. Sign up for Storyteq if you haven't already.
  2. Run the Storyteq Plugin within Figma.
  3. Authenticate your Storyteq account by logging in.
  4. Follow the plugin‚Äôs steps to export and customize your designs.


About


Storyteq helps global brands deliver content faster with the power of automation. Bring teams together to create pixel-perfect campaigns on brand, on time and on budget across markets and channels.


‚úî Save Time ‚Äì Reduce manual work and speed up content production.


‚úî Ensure Consistency ‚Äì Maintain brand integrity across multiple variations.


‚úî Scale Easily ‚Äì Automate and update templates effortlessly in Storyteq.
plugins.tagline: Turn your Figma designs into dynamic editable ads in Storyteq.

plugins.name: Populate JSON data
plugins.description:
‚ú® JSON-to-Design Plugin

üöÄ Supercharge Your Design Workflow


Bring your templates to life with data-driven automation! The JSON-to-Design Plugin allows you to effortlessly populate and duplicate designs using simple JSON files.


Key Features


‚úÖ Upload JSON Files

Supports two formats:


  1. Array format: Automatically duplicates selected designs for each object in the array while replacing placeholders like {{name}} and {{surname}}.


{
"array": [
{ "name": "John", "surname": "Doe" },
{ "name": "Emma", "surname": "Walker" },
{ "name": "Liam", "surname": "Harris" }
]
}


  1. Object format: Updates a single design with JSON values without duplication.


{
"name": "John",
"surname": "Doe"
}


‚úÖ Dynamic Placeholder Replacement

Replace {{name}}, {{surname}}, or other placeholders in text elements with real data‚Äîseamlessly integrate information into your designs.


‚úÖ Save Time and Effort

Eliminate repetitive manual tasks by automating data entry and duplication. Perfect for projects requiring consistent layouts with unique data sets.


How to Use

üéØ Follow these simple steps to get started:


Upload Your JSON File

Upload a correctly formatted JSON file using the plugin. Choose between the array format or object format depending on your use case.

Select the Layer

Highlight the Figma layer containing text objects with placeholders like {{name}} and {{surname}}. Ensure these placeholders are named correctly.

Click ‚ÄúPopulate Design‚Äù

Let the plugin work its magic! It will duplicate designs or populate data based on your JSON file.


üí° Tip: Double-check placeholder names in your design to match JSON keys for smooth operation.


Why Choose JSON-to-Design?


üí° Smart Automation: Unlike other plugins, this tool simplifies both duplication and data replacement in one intuitive flow.

‚è± Time-Saving Magic: Whether you‚Äôre working with a few data points or hundreds, let the plugin handle the heavy lifting while you focus on creativity.
plugins.tagline: The plugin allows you to upload a JSON file and, based on it, populate designs with this data.

Effortlessly create stunning and harmonious color palettes with the enhanced Color Palette Generator. Whether you‚Äôre designing for web, mobile, or branding, this plugin offers everything you need from simple color schemes to complex, accessible palettes.


üí° Key Features:


üéØ Palette Generation:

  2. Explore color harmony with an interactive color wheel and adjustable saturation/lightness sliders.
  3. Extract colors from images with customizable settings for color count, threshold, and brightness.


‚ö° Palette Management:

üßë‚Äçüíª Accessibility & Simulation:
